activities: Everest assists law firms and corporate legal departments in the management of evidence related to litigation.  This involves the collection, processing and hosting of Electronically Stored Information (ESI) and paper.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All types of data collected and processed by Everest is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework, including manually processed data.
recoursemech: For human resources data: cooperation with the EU data protection authorities. For all other types of data: arbitration and mediation services such as the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
